name: Island Surf Shop
description: Premier surf shop with boards, gear, lessons, and everything for water sports.
longDescription: Island Surf Shop is Port Aransas's go-to destination for everything surf and water sports. They carry a wide selection of surfboards, paddleboards, bodyboards, and all the accessories you need. The knowledgeable staff can recommend the right gear for local conditions and offer lessons for beginners. Rentals are also available.
address: 123 Beach Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Port Aransas Outfitters
description: Complete outfitter for fishing, beach, and outdoor gear with local expertise.
longDescription: Port Aransas Outfitters stocks everything you need for coastal adventures. From fishing tackle and rods to beach gear and outdoor clothing, they've got you covered. The staff knows local waters intimately and can advise on what's biting, where, and with what. They also carry casual coastal clothing and accessories.
address: 410 W Cotter Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Island Treasures Gift Shop
description: Beach-themed gifts, souvenirs, and coastal home decor.
longDescription: Island Treasures offers a carefully curated selection of beach-themed gifts and coastal home decor. From seashell jewelry to nautical art, from quirky beach signs to quality souvenirs, there's something for everyone. The shop captures the spirit of Port Aransas and makes for great gifts or personal mementos.
address: 205 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Bikini Beach Boutique
description: Trendy swimwear and beach fashion for women with latest styles.
longDescription: Bikini Beach Boutique is the destination for women's swimwear in Port Aransas. They carry the latest styles from top brands, ranging from classic cuts to trendy designs. The helpful staff assists with fit and style, ensuring you find the perfect suit. They also carry cover-ups, beach dresses, and accessories.
address: 317 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Sandcastle Books & Gifts
description: Independent bookstore with beach reads, local authors, and coastal gifts.
longDescription: Sandcastle Books & Gifts is a charming independent bookstore perfect for beach reading material. They stock beach-read bestsellers, local Texas authors, children's books, and books about coastal living. The gift section features literary-themed items and local souvenirs. It's a book lover's oasis in the heart of downtown.
address: 211 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Port A Mercantile
description: Old-fashioned general store with local goods, beach supplies, and nostalgic charm.
longDescription: Port A Mercantile evokes the general stores of old, stocking a little bit of everything. From local honey and Texas foods to beach supplies and novelty items, it's a joy to browse. The nostalgic atmosphere, wooden shelves, and eclectic inventory make it a unique shopping experience.
address: 134 E Cotter Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Sharky's Souvenirs
description: Fun souvenir shop with t-shirts, beach toys, and vacation keepsakes.
longDescription: Sharky's Souvenirs is the classic beach town souvenir shop—packed with t-shirts, magnets, beach toys, and all the tchotchkes you'd expect. It's the place to grab matching family vacation shirts, beach toys for the kids, or kitschy mementos. Prices are reasonable and the selection is huge.
address: 425 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Coastal Chic Boutique
description: Upscale women's boutique with resort wear, jewelry, and coastal fashion.
longDescription: Coastal Chic Boutique offers elevated resort wear and fashion for women. The carefully selected inventory includes flowing dresses, quality jewelry, and accessories perfect for beach town living. The aesthetic is relaxed elegance—pieces that transition from beach to dinner effortlessly.
address: 200 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Port Aransas Art Center
description: Community art center with gallery, local artists, and rotating exhibitions.
longDescription: The Port Aransas Art Center showcases work from local and regional artists in a welcoming gallery space. Rotating exhibitions feature paintings, sculptures, photography, and mixed media—much of it inspired by coastal life. The center also hosts classes and workshops for aspiring artists.
address: 323 N Alister St, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: The Shell Shack
description: Shells, shell crafts, and coastal treasures from around the world.
longDescription: The Shell Shack is a beach lover's paradise, filled with shells from around the world, shell crafts, and coastal decorating supplies. From tiny specimen shells to large decorative pieces, from raw materials to finished crafts, it's the place for shell enthusiasts and coastal decorators alike.
address: 502 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Anchor Trading Company
description: Nautical home goods, coastal furniture, and beach house essentials.
longDescription: Anchor Trading Company specializes in coastal home goods and beach house essentials. From nautical furniture pieces to coastal tableware, from decorative anchors to lighthouse lamps, they have everything to outfit a beach home. The quality is high, and the aesthetic is classic coastal.
address: 111 Beach Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: The Flip Flop Shop
description: Sandals, flip flops, and beach footwear for the whole family.
longDescription: The Flip Flop Shop stocks an impressive variety of beach footwear, from basic flip flops to quality sandals. They carry styles for men, women, and children, with brands ranging from budget-friendly to premium. It's the place to replace vacation footwear or upgrade your beach shoe game.
address: 334 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: The Salty Mermaid
description: Mermaid-themed gifts, coastal jewelry, and whimsical beach decor.
longDescription: The Salty Mermaid is a whimsical boutique dedicated to all things mermaid and coastal magic. The shop is filled with mermaid-themed gifts, coastal jewelry, dreamy decor, and enchanting finds. It's a bit magical, very fun, and perfect for the mermaid lover in your life.
address: 445 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Beach Bum Apparel
description: Casual beach clothing, graphic tees, and surf-inspired apparel.
longDescription: Beach Bum Apparel stocks the casual, comfortable clothing that beach life demands. Graphic tees, board shorts, tank tops, and sun dresses fill the racks. The vibe is surfer-casual, and the prices are reasonable. It's where you come for vacation wear you'll actually wear back home.
address: 520 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Island Sports & Outdoors
description: Sporting goods, fishing supplies, and outdoor recreation equipment.
longDescription: Island Sports & Outdoors is a comprehensive sporting goods store catering to outdoor enthusiasts. They stock fishing tackle, camping gear, water sports equipment, and outdoor clothing. Whether you're gearing up for a fishing trip, need beach chairs, or want outdoor recreation supplies, they've got it covered.
address: 600 W Cotter Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Texas Coast Gallery
description: Fine art gallery featuring Texas coastal and marine art.
longDescription: Texas Coast Gallery specializes in fine art inspired by the Texas coastline. The gallery features paintings, prints, and sculptures from established and emerging artists, all celebrating coastal themes. From realistic seascapes to abstract marine art, it's a destination for art collectors and admirers.
address: 287 Beach Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Pelican Surf & Rentals
description: Beach and water equipment rentals including kayaks, paddleboards, and beach gear.
longDescription: Pelican Surf & Rentals offers everything you need for water and beach activities without the hassle of bringing your own. They rent kayaks, paddleboards, surfboards, beach chairs, umbrellas, and more. Daily and weekly rates are available, and they can often deliver to your rental property.
address: 401 Cut Off Rd, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Port Aransas Fudge Factory
description: Handmade fudge, saltwater taffy, and sweet treats made on-site.
longDescription: The Port Aransas Fudge Factory creates handmade fudge, saltwater taffy, and candies on-site daily. Watch the fudge being made through their windows, then choose from dozens of flavors. The saltwater taffy comes in countless varieties, and the shop smells absolutely heavenly.
address: 302 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Island Grocery & Market
description: Full grocery store with beach supplies, local products, and vacation essentials.
longDescription: Island Grocery & Market is Port Aransas's main grocery store, stocking everything from fresh produce to beach supplies. It's where locals shop and visitors stock up for their rental properties. The store carries local products, has a decent wine selection, and includes a deli for quick meals.
address: 700 W Cotter Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Windy City Kite Shop
description: Kites of all types, wind toys, and sky-high fun for the beach.
longDescription: Windy City Kite Shop celebrates one of Port Aransas's reliable features—the wind. They stock kites of all sizes and styles, from simple single-line flyers for kids to stunt kites for enthusiasts. Also available are wind chimes, flags, and wind toys perfect for beachfront properties.
address: 415 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Barefoot Boutique
description: Women's clothing boutique with bohemian beach fashion and accessories.
longDescription: Barefoot Boutique offers a bohemian take on beach fashion for women. Flowing maxi dresses, comfortable tunics, handmade jewelry, and artisan accessories fill this charming boutique. The style is effortlessly coastal, and the pieces work for beach days and evening dinners alike.
address: 225 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Tackle Time Bait & Tackle
description: Live bait, fishing tackle, and local fishing knowledge since 1978.
longDescription: Tackle Time has been serving Port Aransas anglers since 1978. They stock live bait, fresh dead bait, and a comprehensive selection of tackle for bay and offshore fishing. The staff are experienced fishermen who know local waters intimately and are happy to share tips on what's biting and where.
address: 200 W Cotter Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Coastal Edge Surf Shop
description: Surf gear, skateboards, and action sports equipment with local vibe.
longDescription: Coastal Edge combines surf shop with skate shop, catering to action sports enthusiasts. They carry surfboards, skateboards, apparel from surf and skate brands, and all the accessories. The vibe is authentically surf-culture, and the staff are riders themselves.
address: 533 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Island Liquor
description: Full liquor store with wine, beer, and spirits for vacation stocking.
longDescription: Island Liquor is Port Aransas's primary liquor store, stocking a full selection of wine, beer, and spirits. The wine selection is surprisingly good for a beach town, and they carry local Texas spirits alongside the major brands. Perfect for stocking your vacation rental or picking up pre-dinner wine.
address: 620 W Cotter Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Pirate Toys & Games
description: Beach toys, games, and fun for kids of all ages.
longDescription: Pirate Toys & Games is kid heaven—packed with beach toys, games, puzzles, and fun stuff for all ages. From sand toys and boogie boards to board games for rainy days, they have entertainment covered. The pirate theme adds extra fun, and kids could browse for hours.
address: 345 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Cinnamon Shore Market
description: Upscale market at Cinnamon Shore with gourmet provisions and beach essentials.
longDescription: Cinnamon Shore Market serves the upscale Cinnamon Shore community with gourmet provisions, quality wines, and beach essentials. The selection is curated for discerning tastes, with artisan products, fresh prepared foods, and quality provisions. Prices reflect the premium location and products.
address: 5809 State Hwy 361, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Beach Accessories Plus
description: Everything for the beach—chairs, umbrellas, coolers, and beach gear.
longDescription: Beach Accessories Plus is the one-stop shop for beach gear. They stock chairs, umbrellas, coolers, wagons, tents, games, and everything else you need for a day on the sand. Rental options are available for larger items, and they can outfit you for an entire beach vacation.
address: 456 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Texas Tees & More
description: Custom t-shirts, Texas-themed apparel, and printed vacation keepsakes.
longDescription: Texas Tees & More specializes in Texas-themed apparel and custom printing. Get matching family vacation shirts, Port Aransas souvenirs, or custom designs printed while you wait. They stock a huge variety of Texas and Port A designs, plus can create custom orders.
address: 378 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373
